title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.3 - Inspection sticker
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.3 - Inspection sticker

State Regulations
(a) The New York Department of Motor Vehicles
certificate of inspection or notice of inspection extension and rejection may
be displayed on the inside of the front windshield, in the lower left-hand
corner, in accordance with section
79.20
(c)(7)
of
this Title. (b) The New York

Department of Transportation certificate of inspection may be displayed on the
inside, of the front windshield, in the lower right-hand corner. (c) The New York City Taxi and Limousine

Commission certificate of inspection may be displayed on the inside of the
front windshield, in the lower left-hand corner. (d) No vehicle shall display more than one
certificate of inspection or notice of inspection extension and
rejection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
